Title: The Engagement Ring

reviewText: This is for me one of the most wonderful movies that I have seen.  It has everything - lovely story, great characters, wonderful setting and scenery, the best music to enhance all of it.  Please, PLEASE, bring it out on DVD.  What is wrong with the guys who run this business?...  Thank you...
Title: The Engagement Ring

reviewText: Light, fluffy, sweet and a lot of fun, "The Engagement Ring" is a nifty made-for-TV movie currently out of print that is worth seeking out if you like movies about vineyards, Italian-Americans, crazy families and/or unlikely romance. Don't we all like that?Patricia Heaton (of all people) plays Sara, the practical daughter of a vineyard-owning Italian family. She wants to expand the business, and she wants to marry her boring fiancée, and all that stands in her way is another family vineyard. If she buys that vineyard, her problems are solved, and she can finally make her own personal blend of wine using grapes from the two perfectly matched vineyards. One hitch: Her family is locked into a deathless feud with the family at the other vineyard, and no amount of coaxing, pleading, begging or bribing can get the families to talk to each other. Something about a marriage proposal and a letter that never came, and wait there's been an earthquake and the post office found the letter and had the nerve to deliver it forty years late, and now the problem is a thousand times bigger than before! Plus the rival vineyard has a cute, gourmet chef nephew who keeps flirty with Sara...Chock full of character actors who should be in everything, sporting lovely locations and snappy dialogue, "The Engagement Ring" is the sort of rainy Sunday afternoon movie that is a delightful way to pass the time. They should rerelease it, because it deserves to be seen.GRADE: B+ (Bump it up another star and give it an A if we go only by the "Made-for-TV-Romance" genre.)
summary: "Love is like-a wine. Just enough makes happiness, too much makes a fool."
Title: The Engagement Ring

reviewText: I caught half of this movie on tv and absolutely loved it! I have been searching for the dvd since, and I am unable to find it. If anyone can give me any information on the dvd purchase it would be highly appreciated! Thanks!
Title: The Engagement Ring

reviewText: This is a great lighthearted love story that makes you laugh and cry.  I taped this on TIVO and have been waiting for this to come out on DVD.  I have been checking periodically on Amazon because I do watch this movie on a regular basis.  PLEASE PLEASE bring this out on DVD for the USA.  Great movie with great actors!!!  Thank you!
Title: The Engagement Ring

reviewText: I saw this movie several years ago on TV and taped it.  The movie is a wonderfully funny and heartwarming story about a "lost" engagement ring and the consequences thereafter.  Whenever I need a good laugh, I replay this movie.  My old VHS tape is getting pretty worn...I certainly hope that one day, "The Engagement Ring" will be put on DVD so I can add it to my movie library!!
Title: The Engagement Ring
